title: Phenotypic Feature
description: An individual phenotypic feature, observed as either present or absent (negated), with possible onset, modifiers and frequency FHIR mapping: Condition (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/condition.html) or Observation (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/observation.html)

description.description: Free-text description of the phenotype. Note that this is not an acceptable place to document/describe the phenotype. The type, onset, and other such fields should be used for this purpose.

label.description: Class label, aka name. For example, "Abnormality of cardiovascular system".

type.title: Phenotype Ontology
type.description: The primary ontology class which describes the phenotype. For example, "HP:0001363"  "Craniosynostosis" FHIR mapping: Condition.identifier

excluded.title: Excluded. Indicate whether or not the phenotype was observed. Default is 'false'; namely, the phenotype was observed.

severity.title: Severity Ontology
severity.description: Severity of the condition (e.g., subclasses of HP:0012824-Severity or SNOMED:272141005-Severities) FHIR mapping: Condition.severity

id.description: A CURIE-style identifier of clinical modifier e.g. Subclasses of HP:0012823.

label.description: Clinical modifier label, aka name e.g. "Variable expressivity"

modifiers.title: Clinical Modifiers
modifiers.description: Subclasses of HP:0012823. Clinical modifier apart from Severity HP:0012824 - Severity

resolution.description: Age or time at which the feature resolved or abated.

evidence.description: Evidences for how the phenotype was determined.

evidence_code.description: TODO: A component: OntologyClass should be a choice. REQUIRED..

iso8601duration.description: The age of this individual as ISO8601 duration or time intervals (e.g., P40Y10M05D).

age.title: Age
age.description: See http://build.fhir.org/datatypes and http://build.fhir.org/condition-definitions.html#Condition.onset_x_. In FHIR, this is represented as a UCUM measurement - http://unitsofmeasure.org/trac/.

iso8601duration.description: The age of this individual as ISO8601 duration or time intervals (e.g., P40Y10M05D).
The age of this individual as ISO8601 duration or time intervals (e.g., P40Y10M05D).

TimeElement.description: A TimeElement object describing the age of the individual at the last time of collection. The Age object allows the encoding of the age either as an ISO8601 duration or time interval (preferred), or as an ontology term object. See http://build.fhir.org/datatypes.
